article.title: Files
article.para: The source form of our translations is XML. We have designed a simple set of “tags” to capture the organization of UDHR. We have a Relax-NG schema: in rnc syntax and in rng syntax.
The encoding of our files is UTF-8, with or without numeric character entities.
The plain text files are encoded in UTF-8, and produced from the XML files by applying this XSLT stylesheet.
The HTML files are encoded in UTF-8, and produced from the XML files by applying this XSLT stylesheet.
